Ananse Documentation¶

The Ananse package is a python package designed to partially automate search term selection and writing search strategies for systematic reviews. Read the documentation at baasare.github.io/ananse and ananse.readthedocs.io/

Contents:

  • About this project
    • Preparing a Search Strategy for a Systematic Review
  • Guide
    • Setup
    • Quick start
  • Code docs

Indices and tables¶

  • Index

  • Module Index

  • Search Page

References¶

This is a python implementation of the R package as mentioned in paper An automated approach to identifying search terms for systematic reviews using keyword co‐occurrence networks by Eliza M. Grames, Andrew N. Stillman Morgan W. Tingley and Chris S. Elphick

ananse
